name: Flip Them All - Impossible Bottle Flipp Challenge
name_original: Flip Them All - Impossible Bottle Flipp Challenge
description:
From water bottle to champagne, soda to petrol jug - you'll need to flip them all!

One touch swipe controls and accuracy star scoring system to earn lives and unlock more bottles!

Judge the spin right and flip onto stacked objects to top the leaderboard and earn achievements.
